You will receive the "Trimmed Vera Traveler" bag by Vera Bradley presented in the solid color Magenta Vera Vera fabric. This Magenta Trimmed Vera Traveler is an earlier style bag that has the smaller quilted diamond pattern and the quilted fabric bottom panel. The Trimmed Vera Traveler is a very generous sized tote style travel bag with one roomy compartment, and lots of pockets for great organization. This stylish and functional bag is just right for summer vacations and weekend get-a-ways too! A great travel bag, it is also a wonderful tote for day outings. And the hands free shoulder strap and top recessed zipper closure makes it the perfect tote to use when browsing festivals or flea markets, as it is definitely big enough to carry all your unique finds and bargains! Vera Bradley sells the Trimmed Vera Traveler in the solid color Vera Vera product line for $128.00. But it is no longer available in the beautiful Magenta color choice, making this New with Tags, Magenta Trimmed Vera Traveler a mighty good find. Vera Vera Solid Colors "Solid color Standouts. Vera Vera is here! Rich in sophistication and class. Whether you are looking for something with a more professional vibe, or simply gravitate toward solid-color showstoppers, you will fancy the solid print, micro-fiber Vera Vera product line." Trimmed Vera Traveler "Vera Bradley has expanded their iconic Namesake style, the "Vera", for a travel ready take on a timeless classic. The Trimmed Vera Traveler, is a extra-large travel tote that features chic faux-leather trim, a recessed zip-top closure and a roomy interior with the six large slip pockets you know and love. A front slip pocket, ideal for keys or a smart phone, is bordered on either side with faux-leather trim, for the perfect finishing touch. Details: Extra-large travel tote version of the iconic namesake styleRecessed Zip Top ClosureFaux-leather Trim and Base12" strap dropInside Vera Bradley Logo LiningSix roomy inside slip pockets ring interiorOutside Front Slip PocketSturdy BaseUltimate Carry-all Care Tips Spot Clean Description: This Vera Bradley "Trimmed Vera Traveler" is presented in the retired Magenta quilted fabric, from the "Vera Vera" solid micro-fiber fabric line. The Vera Bradley Trimmed Vera Traveler is a very generous sized travel bag measuring approximately 25 ½" across the front, 14 ½" tall, and 7 ½" deep. The Trimmed Vera Traveler features a recessed top zip closure. The magenta pink nylon zipper is 24" long and has a white on magenta Vera Bradley signature ribbon zipper pull. One of the best features of the Trimmed Vera Traveler is all the roomy interior pockets. Unzip the recessed top zip closure to reveal one roomy main compartment lined with six (6) interior slip pockets all round. Both the front and back walls have (3) slip pockets, the slip pocket in the middle is 9" wide flanked by 8"wide pockets. All pockets are a generous 9" deep and are somewhat gusseted, allowing room for expansion. The exterior of the Trimmed Vera Traveler features one (1) large slip pocket on the front. This pocket is 8 ½" and 9" deep. Great for all kinds of essentials and go to items. The pocket is trimmed on either side with faux-leather trim that is actually part of the carry strap. Another wonderful feature on the Trimmed Vera Traveler are the double carry straps. Made from faux-leather, magenta in color, each strap measures 28" with a 12" strap drop. Perfect for that comfy shoulderbag fit. Or carry in the crook of you arm or by hand swinging boldly at your side. The Vera Bradley Trimmed Vera Traveler features a semi-solid base that helps to maintain shape and adds stability. Condition: This Vera Bradley Trimmed Vera Traveler bags in the Magenta color choice is New and comes with Original Price Tag.
